resources.string: The goal of this software is to offer different types of jobs to people who are looking for a short-term employment like carrying furniture, mowing, tutoring etc. in their spare time. One of the ideas behind this app, to help people who lost their jobs due to the Covid-19 pandemic. Furthermore, this app also offers ordinary work opportunities, such as full-time and part-time. As well individuals as companies can benefit from this software. Additionally, we extend our app with a marketplace which is especially intended for private users.
